title: Create a High-Level Milestone Schedule
description: For a client presentation, a project manager needs to create a high-level schedule showing only major project milestones.

tasks.description: Filter the main project schedule to display only tasks marked as 'milestones'.
tasks.expected_outcome: A filtered list of milestones like 'Foundation Complete', 'Structure Topped Out', and 'Substantial Completion' is generated.

tasks.description: Generate a summary timeline view based on the filtered milestones.
tasks.expected_outcome: A simplified, high-level timeline is created suitable for a client presentation.
